htmltidy
  • Home
  • Reference
  • News

List available HTML/XML highlight styles

Returns a character vector of available style sheets to use when displaying an XML document.

highlight_styles()

References

See https://highlightjs.org/static/demo/ for a demo of all highlight.js styles

Examples

highlight_styles()
#>  [1] "agate"                     "androidstudio"            
#>  [3] "arta"                      "ascetic"                  
#>  [5] "atelier-cave-dark"         "atelier-cave-light"       
#>  [7] "atelier-cave.dark"         "atelier-cave.light"
